parameter.name: ids
parameter.description: The comma separated list of campaign IDs you wish to view.

parameter.name: nameFilter
parameter.description: To perform a pattern match (LIKE) for Campaign Name.

parameter.name: createdSinceDateFilter
parameter.description: Campaigns created since a certain date.

parameter.name: startedSinceDateFilter
parameter.description: Campaigns that started sending since a certain date.

parameter.name: lastSentSinceDateFilter
parameter.description: Campaigns that last sent since a certain date.

parameter.name: groupIdsFilter
parameter.description: Campaigns sent by users of a certain group.

parameter.name: isFull
parameter.description: Whether or not to return ALL data. Set 1 for ALL data, and 0 for abbreviated.

parameter.name: sortDirection
parameter.description: The direction of sort. Possible values ASC or DESC.

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: The page number. Results are limited to 10 per page.
